Reference

Datasets

abbreviations_lup

Common abbreviations lookup table

badges_lup

ready4 badges lookup table

fn_types_lup

Function type lookup table

fns_dmt_tb

ready4fun function documentation table

object_type_lup

Object abbreviations lookup table

S3 Classes

ready4fun_badges()

ready4 S3 class for tibble object lookup table of badges metadata.

ready4fun_abbreviations()

ready4 S3 class for tibble object lookup table of abbreviations.

ready4fun_executor()

ready4 S3 class for list object specifying function arguments and function.

ready4fun_description()

ready4 S3 class for declaring package description file data.

ready4fun_metadata_a()

ready4 S3 class for package metadata required for initial package set-up step.

ready4fun_metadata_b()

ready4 S3 class for package metadata required for second package set-up step.

ready4fun_manifest()

ready4 S3 class for encapsulating the metadata required for package set-up.

ready4fun_dataset()

ready4 S3 class for declaring package description file data..1

Methods

author.ready4fun_manifest() author(<ready4fun_manifest>) author.ready4fun_metadata_a() author(<ready4fun_metadata_a>)

Author - a method that authors and saves files to local or remote locations

authorClasses.ready4fun_manifest() authorClasses(<ready4fun_manifest>)

AuthorClasses - a method that authors and saves files necessary for creating and documenting classes

authorData.ready4fun_manifest() authorData(<ready4fun_manifest>)

AuthorData - a method that authors and saves files necessary for creating and documenting datasets

authorFunctions.ready4fun_manifest() authorFunctions(<ready4fun_manifest>)

AuthorFunctions - a method that authors and saves files necessary for creating and documenting functions

authorReport.ready4fun_manifest() authorReport(<ready4fun_manifest>)

AuthorReport - a method that authors and saves a report

procure.ready4fun_manifest() procure(<ready4fun_manifest>)

Procure - a method that procures data by executing a search and retrieval algorithm using data contained in an instance of a class

ratify.ready4fun_manifest() ratify(<ready4fun_manifest>)

Ratify - a method that ratifies that an instance of a class conforms to specified criteria

renew.ready4fun_manifest() renew(<ready4fun_manifest>)

Renew - a method that renews an instance of a class by updating it with new data
